channel.title: music on Seung Hyun (Sam) Min
channel.description: Recent content in music on Seung Hyun (Sam) Min

item.title: Why Flight of the Bumblebee is a great etude
item.description: I play the clarinet as a hobby although I used to play it competitively during high school. Unfortunately, since I began my undergraduate studies, I have stopped receiving lessons, which are quite expensive. So during undergrad, my playing ability rarely improved. However, perhaps thanks to COVID-19, I have had more spare time recently and have been able to find practice routines that have worked for me to become a better player.
